page.title: 10BARNS GREEN HALF MARATHON
page.content: THE FIRST{BARNS GREEN HALF MARATHON} TOOK PLACE IN OCTOBER 1982 OVER THE DISTANCE OF 13.1 MILES. THE OLDEST EVER COMPETITER IN THE BARNS GREEN HALF MARATHON WAS A MAN CALLED GORDON MATTHEWS AGED 67 AND HAS RUN IN EACH OF THE HALF MARATHONS. THE FIRST HALF MARATHON NEEDED NINE MONTHS FOR PREPARATION. THERE ARE A LOT OF ENTRIES AND IN THE LAST HALF MARATHON WHICH WAS IN 1984. THERE WERE 2369 ENTRIES. THE RECORD TIME FOR MEN OUT OF THE LAST 3 YEARS WAS 1.04.49 SET BY A MAN NAMED BOB TREADWELL. BOB TREADWELL IS ALSO THE OLDEST WINNER AND HE WON IN 1983. THE YOUNGEST MALE WINNER WAS PAUL ROWLANDS AND HE WON IN 1984. NO_ONE HAS EVER BEEN INJURED BADLY, ALTHOUGH 4 PEOPLE COLLAPSED ON THE FINISHING LINE BECAUSE THEY WERE EXHAUSTED.
